Issues.Title: Switch to net7.0 tfm
Issues.Body:
* dotnet/runtime and dotnet/aspnetcore have already switched over, e.g. https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/blob/main/eng/Versions.props#L46. See https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/pull/36328/commits/5c4e769b076a37b65b310d8f792a9d4a40d06bad for more details.
* remove all non dotnet7 NuGet feeds
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Switch to net7.0 tfm" (#5801)

Issues.Title: More MessageBox buttons
Issues.Body:
WinForms already had more buttons available for their MessageBox and https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/4746 adds more.

## Buttons

[`System.Windows.MessageBoxButton`](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.windows.messageboxbutton?view=windowsdesktop-6.0#fields)
- OK
- OKCancel
- YesNo
- YesNoCancel

[`System.Windows.Forms.MessageBoxButtons`](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.windows.forms.messageboxbuttons?view=windowsdesktop-6.0#fields)
- AbortRetryIgnore
- CancelTryContinue
- OK
- OKCancel
- RetryCancel
- YesNo
- YesNoCancel

## Results

[`System.Windows.MessageBoxResult`](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.windows.messageboxresult?view=windowsdesktop-6.0#fields)
- Cancel
- No
- None
- OK
- Yes

[`System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult`](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.windows.forms.dialogresult?view=windowsdesktop-6.0#fields)
- Abort
- Cancel
- Continue
- Ignore
- No
- None
- OK
- Retry
- TryAgain
- Yes
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "More MessageBox buttons" (#5795)

The following updates ensure that dependencies with a *CoherentParentDependency*
attribute were produced in a build used as input to the parent dependency's build.
See [Dependency Description Format](https://github.com/dotnet/arcade/blob/master/Documentation/DependencyDescriptionFormat.md#dependency-description-overview)

Issues.Title: The screen reader does not announce the column headers along with the row data while navigating the first row of the "ListView" table .
Issues.Body:
**GitHubTags**:#A11yMAS;#A11ySev2;#A11yTCS#WCAG4.2.3;#DesktopApp;#Win10;#BM-.NetCore(WPF)-Win32-July2021;#.NET Core;#Benchmark;#Narrator;#NVDA

### Environment Details:
Application Name: Azure RTOS - Trace X 
Windows Version: Win10 
Application Version: 6.1.8.0
Screen Reader: NVDA2021. 2, Narrator

### Repro Steps:
1. Open ListView file.
2. Navigate to the first row of the table.
3. Start Screen reader and observe the announcement.

### Actual:
The screen reader does not announce the column headers while navigating the first row of the "ListView" table which consist the column header and also its not announcing the data present under the row along with column header.

### Expected:
Screen reader should announce the column headers while navigating to the first row of the "ListView" table along with the data present under the row. 

### User Impact:
Screen reader users will not get information about the table column header and its structure.

[ListView_20211124 (1).zip](https://github.com/dotnet/wpf/files/7659214/ListView_20211124.1.zip)
https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/86710888/144817461-4aba78bf-1281-4dfa-9652-d16e6cba55b6.mp4
https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/86710888/144817558-c598e707-9704-4b26-8796-7f06103c0b73.mp4
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "The screen reader does not announce the column headers along with the row data while navigating the first row of the "ListView" table ." (#5780)

Issues.Title: Fix typo in issue template
Issues.Body:
## Description

"Minimal repro" or "Minimal repo" ?

Update the `.github\ISSUE_TEMPLATE\bug_report.md` file

## Customer Impact

None.

## Regression

.NET 7

## Testing

None.

## Risk

None.
